section.title: Introduction
section.para: The FlyMine project is building an integrated database of genomic, expression and protein data for Drosophila and Anopheles and making this available to the worldwide research community via web and bioinformatics interfaces.
An initial release of the database is now accessible, accompanied by full documentation. For more information about FlyMine please consult the more detailed introduction.
Start a query using FlyMine. See quick start guide for more details.
